name: What We Do In The Dark
name_original: What We Do In The Dark
description:
In What We Do in the Dark, 6 ordinary people are locked in a haunted mansion. Except, two of them are cultists! Every night, a group of players try to complete tasks to escape. The cultists will trick and sabotage the detectives to prevent them from leaving.

Will the detectives suss out the cultists and escape, or will the cultists trap them in the mansion?

PlayingCards.io room link: https://playingcards.io/k2fw6e

Note 1: If playing on PlayingCards.io, it's recommended to download and import the pico file to your own room

Note 2: If playing on PlayingCards.io, use Profile Cards instead of Profile Tokens.
